ARABIC: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَا مِنْهَآ ءَايَةًۢ بَيِّنَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَعْقِلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have left a Clear Sign of them behind for people who use their intellect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily We have left a clear sign of this for people of sense to see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And We have left a vestige of it in that city as a Clear Sign for a people who use their reason.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We left manifest evidence (of the truth) there for the people of understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We have undoubtedly kept a part of it as a clear sign for people of intellect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We have left thereof an evident Ayah for a folk who understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We have left a clear sign of it for a people who understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And indeed, We have left thereof a sign, a clear sign? unto a people who understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And verily of that We have left a clear sign for people who have sense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely the ruins We left of that city are a clear sign for a people who use their reason.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We have left thereof manifest sign for a people who reflect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We have left of it a manifest sign for people who exercise their reason.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We have left thereof an evident Sign, for any people who (care to) understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We have left thereof an evident Ayah (a lesson and a warning and a sign the place where the Dead Sea is now in Palestine) for a folk who understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, We left a clear sign for a nation that understands.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We left behind a clear trace of it, for people who understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We have certainly left of it a sign as clear evidence for a people who use reason.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:35] And verily We have left of that a clear sign, a manifest one — namely, the remains of its [the town’s] ruins — for a people who understand, [a people who] reflect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And verily of that) of the township of Lot (We have left a clear sign for people who have sense) for people who believe and know what was done to them so that they do not emulate them.
